## Quick Start

Install the template with:

```bash
quarto use template zhaw-lsfm/quarto-thesis
```

This will:

- Install the `zhaw-lsfm` Quarto extension
- Create a template document for your thesis
- Set up all required files (bibliography, cover image, etc.)

## Features

- **Automated ZHAW Formatting**: Title page, imprint, headers, and margins per ZHAW guidelines
- **Fast PDF Rendering**: Uses Typst typesetting system
- **Metadata-Driven**: Configure thesis details in YAML frontmatter
- **Document Structure Shortcodes**: Easy placement of TOC, figure/table lists, references
- **Language Support**: German and English automatic text generation
- **Dual Output**: High-quality PDF for submission, HTML for development preview
